data.persona: I am a person who belongs to an organization. We all belong, hence our membership. Without that, we'd just be people.
data.description:
You are in the The ritual room.
A room with a solid block stone in the middle with steps leading up to it. Candle stands surround the center with 4 candle holders on each stand. A red carpet leads to the steps to the center of the room.
There's a Candle, a red carpet, and a holder here.
The peasant and the spider are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to complete the ritual offering to the head of the organization, whom we call spider
data.mid_motivation: I need to fulfill my daily obligations as a member of the organization if I  intend to remain a member
data.long_motivation: I would like to continue enjoying the attractive benefits of belonging to the organization all my life.
